name: fingerprint puppets
sizes_available: adult size: 3”/7.5cm tall. child size: 2.5”/6.5cm tall.
notes:
to watch a talk i gave to knitting4peace on the inspiration for my designs and my brand new finger puppets [click here!][1] to just watch my fingerprint puppet section [click here!][2]

these cheerful and diversity-friendly finger puppets were designed for [knitting4peace][3]. they are knit in the round, on dpns, with bobble boots and arms to save on fiddly sewing. the girl’s hair is attached by looping it around the head hole with a tapestry needle. for both the adult and child sizes i recommend sock/fingering. for slightly bigger puppets you could use sport or dk.

**permission**
although these puppets were designed for knitting4peace, you have my permission to use them in any way you wish, but i do ask that you make a small donation of $5 dollars (or more) in exchange. you can donate [here!][4] if $5 is not doable please consider this pattern a gift. **these puppets would also be a great gift to a school classroom to remind children that all are welcome!**

> **praise for fingerprint puppets**
